name: Peppermill Spa Suite
description: Peppermill Reno's Spa Suites are beautifully appointed 390 sq. ft. rooms featuring a relaxing jetted bathtub and a sitting area for two. An unforgettable stay in a luxurious hotel suite — ideal for couples or golfers who want to recover in style after a full round.
shortDescription: 390 sq. ft. Peppermill Spa Suites with jetted bathtub and sitting area for two.

faqs.question: What's included in the Peppermill Spa Suite?
faqs.answer: A jetted bathtub, sitting area for two, plush pillow-top mattress, and all AAA Four Diamond amenities at 390 sq. ft.

faqs.question: Are golf package rates available for Spa Suites?
faqs.answer: Yes — Golf the High Sierra negotiates preferred group rates for Peppermill Spa Suites as part of complete golf packages.

testimonials.quote: The Peppermill Spa Suite was a perfect end to a great golf trip. Soaked in the jetted tub after 18 holes — exactly what we needed.
testimonials.author: Karen L.

testimonials.quote: Great value for a spa suite. GTHS got us a solid rate and the room was beautiful — jetted tub, great views, luxury feel.
testimonials.author: Steve M.
